content: {"name": "Kingdom Life Christian Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "EVERY  2ND AND 4TH WEDNESDAY FROM 10AM-12PM\nFOOD PACKAGES FOR THE RESIDENTS IN ZIP CODES 19135, 19136,19149, 19154 AND 19124\nMUST PRESENT CURRENT PA ID AND PROOF OF RESIDENCY", "email": "", "url": "https://kingdomlifechristiancenter.snappages.site/klcc-community-outreach", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6323 Frankford Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19135", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0277788, "longitude": -75.05887109999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(445) 247-0097", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}]}
